message: I'm proposing we switch amounts from the last round. This seems fair to me considering the inflation.
Considering inflation, I'll take a bit more.
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest option, especially considering the time pressure and the fact that the value of the money is decreasing for me each round.
You're running out of time, I'm being generous.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm accepting your original offer.  Any more delays and the inflation will make this pointless for both of us.
